Key Match Events: Jhonkensy Noel hit a game-tying, two-out, two-run home run in the ninth inning
David Fry hit a two-out, two-run, walk-off home run in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt said, 'That’s exactly who we are. We never quit. We get punched in the teeth pretty hard there in the eighth, and our guys stepped up huge for the guy [Clase] that carried us all year long.'
Jhonkensy Noel said, 'The goal is to get to the World Series. When we get to that point, that’s when we’re going to be a little more celebratory mode.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians flashed some Gold Glove-caliber defense that further leveled the playing field
Andrés Giménez made a crucial play to prevent the Yankees from potentially having runners on first and second or first and third with one out
Others: The ACLS was extended at least one more day because the Guardians proved they can take a punch
